Students get a close look at Devil’s Elbow roadworks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/26/students-get-a-close-look-at-devils-elbow-roadworks/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/26/students-get-a-close-look-at-devils-elbow-roadworks/ Tutira students got a close-up look at Devil's Elbow work, which is progressing well. Mon, 26 Aug 2024 04:13:15 +0000 Senior students from Tutira School were shown over the work done at Devil's Elbow on SH2 to better-protect the link between Napier and Gisborne.
